_sText:
Hey guys ! Welcome to the first scavange map named no_mercy :)
I'm sur that you have ever play at this game in l4d2 :)
Now in CSS ! But it's little bit different : - For start the round , survivors must jump outside the yellow scare. - You have shotgun , Ak47 , snip and you'r job it to collect 15 barrels and go back to the generator for drop theme on him's back. - Small green gourds are medkits , press "E" for use once only. The game can be played with zombie mod or an other one :)
I'm open to sell comments :)
Look at the prefab here [>click<](http://css.gamebanana.com/prefabs/6234 ">click<")
Thx to GRRRRRUDGE for the map Thx again and have fun ! Update : - Nav configuration - Spawn tero modified
